title: Siddharth Agarwal
text:
Siddharth Agarwal (also known as Asid) is an undergraduate student of IIT Kharagpur, known for carrying out The Madness Project . [ 1 ] He's a photographer and hosts his work under the a Facebook page name ASIDity, which harbors more than 2500 likes. [ 2 ]
He also writes about his experiences on his website top followers apk .

title: Involvements
text: After The Madness Project, he was involved in another project called Walking Back To My Roots which involved walking over 400 km across Rajasthan. [ 3 ] He also raised ₹ 30,000 from this project for Rang De campaign. During his early academic years, he had been event head and steering committee member of Spring Fest .

title: References
text: ↑ "Range De - The Madness Project" . Rang De . Retrieved 20 September 2015 . ↑ "ASIDity - Facebook" . Retrieved 20 September 2015 . ↑ "Two IITians Set Off On A 600 Kms Long Journey On Foot Searching For Their Roots" . MensXP. 17 December 2014 . Retrieved 20 September 2015 .
